[![How women's T20 leagues are shaping both disparity and development](https://static.cricbuzz.com/a/img/v1/300x170/i1/c625571/gujarat-giants-ended-up-at-the.jpg)**How women's T20 leagues are shaping both disparity and development**](https://www.cricbuzz.com/cricket-news/133720/how-womens-t20-leagues-are-shaping-both-disparity-and-development "How women's T20 leagues are shaping both disparity and development")

Two trends in women's cricket show the value that T20 leagues bring to developing the game, and the inequality in that development
